title.rendered: Third Year Apprentice Graduates Moving On to Four!

content.rendered: Congratulations to our 3rd year apprentice graduates that are moving on to 4th year! Special congratulations to this year’s Apprentice of the Year: Jordan Porter! Jordan (left back row) was selected for his genuine desire to get better and wanting to move up in the company. We want to also thank our wonderful instructor Mr. Mike Blossom for sharing his knowledge and time with the apprentices! Congratulations also goes to: Brad Wilson, Casey Clarida, Colin O’Mara and Brady McNees for testing out of first year!
